  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "Meal Plan Eligibility";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

    <div class="main-corners">
     <div class="column-66 float-left">
      <div id="tcm1703-98404">
       <div id="sustContainer">
        <h1>
         Eligibility for Meal Plans Based on Housing
        </h1>
        <div>
         <p>
          Students are eligible for the meal plans marked with a red check. Mouse over each type of housing for a full list of locations that fall under each category.
         </p>
         <table width="100%" border="1px;" style="border-collapse:collapse;" id="mealplans">
          <tbody>
           <tr valign="bottom">
            <td width="30%" class="topTable">
              
            </td>
            <td width="10%" class="topTable" style="text-align: center;">
             <strong>
              Platinum
             </strong>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" class="topTable" style="text-align: center;">
             <strong>
              Gold
             </strong>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" class="topTable" style="text-align: center;">
             <strong>
              Silver
             </strong>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" class="topTable" style="text-align: center;">
             <strong>
              Bronze
             </strong>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" class="topTable" style="text-align: center;">
             <strong>
              Traditional
             </strong>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" class="topTable" style="text-align: center;">
             <strong>
              Cardinal
             </strong>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" class="topTable" style="text-align: center;">
             <strong>
              No Plan
             </strong>
            </td>
           </tr>
           <tr valign="center">
            <td width="30%" style="text-align: center;">
             <span title="Taylor, East, Martin Luther, Benfer, Alpha Chi Omega, Phi Sigma Sigma, Delta Zeta, Non-first-year students in first year Residence Halls (ex. Resident Advisors)">
              Upper Class Students in Residence Halls
             </span>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
           </tr>
           <tr valign="center">
            <td width="30%" style="text-align: center;">
             <span title="Brown, Prosser, Walz">
              First Year Students in Residence Halls
             </span>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />

            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
           </tr>
           <tr valign="center">
            <td width="30%" height="40px" style="text-align: center;">
             <span title="South, Robertson">
              Student in college-owned or leased housing of 4 or less and a galley kitchen*
             </span>
            </td>

             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
           </tr>
           <tr valign="center">
            <td width="30%" style="text-align: center;">
             <span title="Phi Kappa Tau, Sigma Phi Epsilon, Alpha Tau Omega">
              Student in privately-owned Fraternity Chapter House
             </span>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
           </tr>
           <tr valign="center">
            <td width="30%" style="text-align: center;">
             <span title="MILE, Village, 2201 Chew Street, Phi Mu, Delta Tau Delta, Head Resident Advisors in apartment-style housing">
              Student in college-owned or leased apartment, suite or house with a capacity for 8 or less and a full kitchen**
             </span>
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
           </tr>
           <tr valign="center">
            <td width="30%" style="text-align: center;">
             Commuter or Off Campus
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />

             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />

           </tr>
           <tr valign="center">
            <td width="30%" style="text-align: center;">
             Student with Documented
             <br />
             Medical Need
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">

           </tr>
           <tr valign="center">
            <td width="30%" style="text-align: center;">
             Student Internship***
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />

             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
            <td width="10%" style="text-align: center;">
             <img title="redCheck" alt="Yes" border="0px" width="30px" height="30px" src="/Images/redCheck_tcm1703-98405.png" />
            </td>
            <td width="10%">
              
            </td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table>
         <br />
         <em>
          *A galley kitchen is required to have a full sized refrigerator, a sink with running hot and cold water, a microwave, and at least (4) feet of hygenic counter space
          <br />
          <br />
          **A full kitchen is required to have a full sized refrigerator, a sink with running hot and cold water, an oven and range top with adequate exhaust, and at least (4) feet of hygenic counter space
          <br />
          <br />
          ***College approved course equal to one full unit
         </em>
         <br />
         <br />
         <div id="reshall1" style="display: none;">
          Taylor, East, Martin Luther, Benfer, Alpha Chi Omega, Phi Sigma Sigma, Delta Zeta, Non-first-year students in first year Residence Halls
          <em>
           (ex. Resident Advisors)
          </em>
         </div>
         <div id="reshall2" style="display: none;">
          Brown, Prosser, Walz
         </div>
         <div id="reshall3" style="display: none;">
          South, Robertson
         </div>
         <div id="reshall4" style="display: none;">
          Phi Kappa Tau, Sigma Phi Epsilon, Alpha Tau Omega
         </div>
         <div id="reshall5" style="display: none;">
          MILE, Village, 2201 Chew Street, Phi Mu, Delta Tau Delta, Head Resident Advisors in apartment-style housing
         </div>
        </div>
